details.fellowshipSong: It Came upon the Midnight Clear #093

list: The Lottie Moon Christmas Card drive ends Wednesday, Dec. 17! If you want to send people in the church a card, please bring the cards and 78 cents per card to Mike Baker, Butch Grubb, or Brian Lewis. An anonymous donor gave money to pay “postage” to help anyone in need who wants to send cards within the church.
Frank Plessinger will teach a high school/college age Sunday School beginning in January.
